RationalNumber - Class in common
This class represents a rational number, typically used in the TIFF/EXIF image format.
RationalNumber(long, long, RationalNumber.DataType, boolean) - Constructor for class common.RationalNumber
The core private constructor used by all public constructors and the simplify method to create new RationalNumber instances.
RationalNumber(int, int, RationalNumber.DataType) - Constructor for class common.RationalNumber
Constructs an instance to handle both signed and unsigned 32-bit integers.
RationalNumber(int, int) - Constructor for class common.RationalNumber
Constructs a signed instance, interpreting inputs as standard 32-bit signed integers.
RationalNumber.DataType - Enum in common

Constructs an instance to store signed integers.
